channel.title: OMFG how the heck
channel.description:
Ok guys hey im new to the site. But thats not what this is about. I have a private server and i created a fwe customs items like: rune hat blue santa dragon t and other stuff. I can spawn them But how do i amke another shop area that makes the ppl that sell the custom items? Please Post here. MY best reagrds
~Shadow Hell

item.title: OMFG how the heck
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Pure Destiny, post:7, topic:265298”][quote author=Motoguyx378 link=topic=350248.msg2691362#msg2691362 date=1235994158]
??
[/quote]Just because he can add customs doesn’t mean he can add them to shops.
What if he’s a newbie and only read the ‘How to add custom items’ tutorial?
He wouldn’t know how to add them to the shops.[/quote]
qft.

Read full topic
